metadata.name: The Little Rascal #1
metadata.description: The Little Rascals is a collection of 3,333 Genesis Rascals that are diversely different with each to their own unique attributes; special and one of a kind. Holding a Rascal will allow you to escape from the brutal reality of EARTH and entering the Rascalverse with your virtual Rascal. Each Rascal will secure you a golden space in the Rascalverse that you can indulge yourself in.
